This class provides Integer utility methods required by this application.

                      throws ApplicationException,

Tokenises the input into an array of Integers.

Parameters:
str_arr - an array of Strings. Must not be null.
Returns:
the array of Integers
Throws:
ApplicationException - if a null parameter is passed into this method
java.lang.NumberFormatException - if an element is unable to be parsed into an Integer

Tokenises the input into an array of Integers.

Parameters:
string - a String to be tokenised. Must not be null.

Returns:
the array of Integers

ApplicationException - if a null parameter is passed into this method

tokenise

public static int[] tokenise(java.lang.String string)
                      throws ApplicationException
Tokenises the input into an array of Integers.

Delimiter defaults to DEFAULT_DELIMITER.

Parameters:
string - a String to be tokenised. Must not be null.
Returns:
the array of Integers
Throws:
ApplicationException - if a null parameter is passed into this method
java.lang.NumberFormatException - if an element is unable to be parsed into an Integer
